examples: They will be exhibiting their new designs at the trade fairs.
Estarán exhibiendo sus nuevos diseños en las ferias.
Only one painting was exhibited in the artist's lifetime.
Solo se exhibió una pintura en vida del artista.
He longed for the chance to exhibit his work publicly.
Anhelaba la oportunidad de exhibir públicamente su trabajo.
He exhibits regularly in local art galleries.
Expone regularmente en galerías de arte locales.
